channel.title: Lab.1 - Onboarding :: Kentik Partner Workshop
channel.description: Theory and LAB description Task 1.1 - Device DiscoveryDeploy Universal Agent and Onboard Devices via Kentik NMS Task 1.2 - Portal ConfigurationConfigure relevant Kentik Resources to support our use case Task 1.3 - Enabling FlowPerform required steps to ingest netflow from devices Task 1.4 - Portal VerificationVerify visibility in the portal
